title.rendered: Sweeten yourself with Esplanade’s Carnival donuts

content.rendered:
[vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space][vc_column_text]

Is there a better way to sweeten up this Carnival day than with enchantingly delicious doughnuts? Stop by the charming Le Bistro and treat yourself to delicious homemade donuts or choose the Donut Box and take the flavors of Esplanade with you and surprise your family or colleagues at work.

Visit charming Le Bistro on Carnival day, Tuesday, 13 th February from 9 am or simply pick up your donuts and surprise your friends and colleagues at work with a carnival treat. Priced at 2.5 € per piece.

Vanilla, enticing nougat-chocolate and classic marmalade – 6 pieces of handmade donuts of each flavor two packed in a Donut Box will be available at Le Bistro for 15 € .

Orders for the Donut Box are accepted by Le Bistro (order at least 1 hour before pickup is required):

01 45 666 11

For larger donut orders, please contact the catering and events office at:

01 45 66 035 or 01 45 66 037

meetings.events@esplanade.hr

 

Published: 9/2/2024[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]

excerpt.rendered: Bite into our deliciously famous Esplanade donuts. Choose between those filled with homemade jam, vanilla or fine chocolate and enjoy this sweet specialty.
